slider.name: Responsive
slider.title: Responsive and Well-Organized web design
slider.description: One of our main concerns is to take care of your website's responsivness and give it the best possible design.

slider.name: Interactive
slider.title: Fully interactive web applications
slider.description: We use the best libraries and frameworks to make the website interactive to users.

slider.name: Fast
slider.title: High speed and performance
slider.description: Our main goal is to deliver the best performance to our customers in the least possible time.

seo.title: Full support of search engine optimization
seo.description: Search engine optimization is very important for a website in order to appear at the top, we use SEO friendly libraries and packages to improve core web vitals, metadata and other factors that boost the ranking.

frontEndAndbackEnd.title: Works on both front-end and back-end
frontEndAndbackEnd.description: In most cases, websites require both front-end and back-end for full functionality. Based on the website's content, we make a corresponding front-end that runs on the client, and a back-end that runs on the server, if necessary, we use database and then use an API to retrieve data from it.

workTime.title: Open to work at any time
workTime.description: As said, we're open to work, you can visit our contact page.
